definition: camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: The battalion formed up by companies on the barrack square.
sentences.chinese: 排長們在營房廣場整理隊伍。

sentences.english: Mahboob's men lack fuel for the generators that provide electricity for their barracks and vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 發電機可以爲他們的營房和汽車提供電力。

sentences.english: Women in the barracks at Auschwitz in January 1945.
sentences.chinese: 這是1945年在奧斯維辛營房的女人。

sentences.english: This provides the experence for completely raising the barracks building quality of the military…
sentences.chinese: 必須強化營房建設質量管理制度。

sentences.english: The new soldiers were roll-called in front of their barracks.
sentences.chinese: 新兵在他們的營房前接受點名。

sentences.english: The paratroopers are changing into their gear in the barrack, but Perconte is feeling very chagrin.
sentences.chinese: 士兵們在營房裏換制服，但是普康迪覺得很委屈。

sentences.english: He walked out of the camp, (a ) gun in ( his) hand.
sentences.chinese: 他手握着鋼槍走出營房。

sentences.english: The battalion marched from the barracks to the parade ground.
sentences.chinese: 這個營的士兵列隊從營房齊步走向檢閱場。

sentences.english: When I arrived at the camp I put my bag down and just cried. That feeling still won't go.
sentences.chinese: 一到營房放下包就開始哭泣，那種感覺至今揮之不去。

sentences.english: The winter was extremely long. The conditions in the barracks were appalling.
sentences.chinese: 冬日無比漫長，營房裏的條件差到了極點。

sentences.english: They are making our thousands of warriors of the PLA go hungry in the cantonment .
sentences.chinese: 他們讓數萬人民解放軍的戰士們在營房裏捱餓。

sentences.english: The barracks' access drive and turnaround create a formal entrance into the complex.
sentences.chinese: 出入營房的車道與綜合區有正式入口相連。

sentences.english: He announced that the army and police had been confined to barracks.
sentences.chinese: 他通告說軍隊和警察已經被禁閉在營房中不得外出。

sentences.english: The soldiers were prohellobited from leaving camp after dark.
sentences.chinese: 入夜後士兵禁絕離開營房。

sentences.english: The Sakatani family, seven in all, was assigned a single room in a barracks.
sentences.chinese: 阪谷一家七口被分到一座營房的某個單間內。

definition: Nananqu district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
Old town district/Gucheng district of Lijiang city 麗江市|丽江市[Li4 jiang1 shi4], Yunnan
Taroko, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan
Taichung or Taizhong county in central Taiwan
United Front (either of the two alliances between the Guomindang and the Communist Party, 1923-1927 and 1937-1945)
